entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' #95042
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable EventSource on more tests #95039
  • Anonymous type accros assembly #95033
  • Problems running coreclr tests with run.cmd/py #95032
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'genCountBits(availableSet) == 1' #95025
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] Temporarily target loc to the release/9.0 branch #95024
    9.0.0
  • Reenable sdk->runtime subscription for ApiCompat task #95022
    9.0.0
  • MonoProxy throws System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute. #95019
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code that doesn't compile when using recodrs or classes with requried properties as option Property #95006
    9.0.0
  • Unhandled error: System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #95000
  • CompareAttribute refers wrong name value #94997
    Future
  • JIT: Forward substitution does not handle promoted structs #94994
    Future
  • Intrinsically recognize Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition #94990
  • Analysis support for new `Type.GetMethod` overload #94989
    9.0.0
  • WasiConsole -- publish warnings when trimming is disabled #94984
    9.0.0

Closed

  • File.ReadAllTextAsync not behaving asynchronously when called on inaccessible network files #25314
    Future
  • Provide a way to get the information about the actual command line used when using Process's ArgumentList #27251
    Future
  • Docs and XML comments for Min/MaxMagnitude are incorrect #94500
    9.0.0
  • Coreclr test counts don't agree for BuildAsStandalone true/false #95029
    9.0.0
  • Access Violation in System.DateTime.get_Date() on coreclr 2.1.15 #34162
    Future
  • error C3611: 'System::Numerics::INumberBase::System::IUtf8SpanFormattable.Try Format': a sealed function cannot have a pure-specifier #94998
  • Work item tests crash on OSX x64 Debug #87287
  • Official build is failing on OneLocBuild step #90466
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty test failing #91308
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty failed #88843
  • Failure in building devcontainer with tag v7.0.9. #91836
  • Bug in DateTime.TryFormat method on dotnet 8 #95012
  • The TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById is not always case-insensitive on Linux #95003
  • c++/cli compile error 3611 if System::IntPtr is used #94723
  • Vector512 CopyTo<T>(this Vector512<T> vector, T[] destination, int startIndex) incorrect #94743
  • LibraryImport generator can't generate correct syntax for ref struct #94840
    9.0.0
  • Console.CursorTop causes invalid Console.ReadKey input #88343
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce BinaryData.Length #95005
  • [7.0] CI failure in ios arm64 mono: The code signature version is no longer supported. Could not install the application. #86613
  • JIT: Bad codegen on x86 #94996
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add lowercase support for Convert.ToHexString #60393
    Future
  • Backspace does not work properly when using Console.ReadLine() in Alpine #64355
    8.0.0
  • DisabledRuntimeMarshalling.PInvokeAssemblyMarshallingEnabled.DelegatesFromExternalAssembly.StructWithDefaultNonBlittableFields() failing #94931
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95041
    needs-area-label
  • Change to use std int for Interop tests #95040
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Convert S.R.InteropServices.Marshal COM-related FCalls to QCalls #95038
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix managed ContentionStart data #95035
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • JIT: Keep fgBBcount up to date #95034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95027
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Vector512.CopyTo #95026
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [perf] Run localized Blazor scenario #95023
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • Add SVE InstructionSet for Arm64 #95021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Implement eval (ICorDebugEval related). #95020
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Dump BB in/out memory SSAs inline when SSA is valid #95017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Predicate register placeholder methods and Z registers #95016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set frozen cache emscripten variable conditionally #95015
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Grammar update for Chunk<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, int size) returns xmldoc #95010
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Split commands in FtpWebRequest #95009
    area-System.Net
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary xml docs #94993
    documentation, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • Replace LowLevelLock with Lock #94991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix null reference exception in ilverify #94988
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • Shortcut `List<T>` for `Enumerable.Any()` #94983
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update Instrument.cs documentation #95036
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix PALTests build #95028
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Redirect stderr to stdout when invoking merged tests #94986
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix Vector512.CopyTo #94795
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Update windows-requirements.md to call out the current C++/CLI and IDE requirements #95018
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0] Fix libraries outerloop pipelines #95011
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2319609 #95013
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable OneLocBuild in runtime-official.yml #95014
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] debugger tests: remove duplicate container-detected messages #94963
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94930
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Don't put any modifiers after ref #94875
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Console.Unix: StdInReader: use stateful decoder. #95004
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • P/Invokes should use C types not C++. #94942
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add ABI note about small return types #94987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Alpine Linux mono build and coreclr pgo support #90251
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix comment typo in jithelp.asm #94956
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 119.0.6045.159, windows: 119.0.6045.160 #94962
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the overwritten of reg21 when `pLookup->sizeOffset >2047` #94766
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Allow scalar valuetypes with r4/r8 members. #94969
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix trimming analysis failure #94985
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: Process all EH successors for "in-block" defs in SSA #94955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [ILLink analyzer] Improve handling of invalid operations #94888
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #94979
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #94965
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread #94855
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • UnzipEven() and Count16BitElements() intrinsics for Arm64 SVE #94765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #94861
    area-System.Net.Http
  • We already have cross-compilers etc for musl and win-arm64. Actually use them #94876
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Publishing static library should also publish other necessary static libs #1733

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishTrimmed with --no-restore silently skips trimming if not previously restored #37049
  • Listing packages using a relative path solution file fails with the .NET 8 SDK when it succeeded in .NET 7 #37048
  • dotnet publish with pinned RuntimeFrameworkVersion fails for Windows projects #37044
  • Dotnet watch unable to detect 2nd blazor app #37041
  • dotnet not recognised as cmdlet, function... #37037
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64] With .NET 9 Preview SDK installed, installing wasm-tools workload or maui workload option failed with error. #37035

Closed

  • [Ubuntu] Since dotnet 8 its impossible to launch compiled binaries using full path #37056
  • Broken incremental build related to SourceLink and generated AssemblyInfo.cs #37027
  • [Hot Reload] `ENC0003: Updating 'attribute' requires restarting the application` caused by `AssemblyInformationalVersionAttribute` #36666
  • Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.DotNet.Installer.Windows.NullInstallerLogger' to type 'Microsoft.DotNet.Installer.Windows.TimestampedFileLogger' #36757
  • Broken installation after reboot #36871
    Discussion
  • Runtime Ubuntu v6.0.111 .NET location: Not found for tools #29499
  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 9.0 sdk installed, .NET Host stop working after running "dotnet --info" in CLI #37028

PullRequests

Created

  • wrap and handle cancellation exceptions in .NET Task #37055
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Container support for AOT publishing and targeting musl runtimes. #37054
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump Wcwidth.Sources from 1.0.0 to 2.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #37032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.4 to 22.5.0 in /eng/dependabot #37031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Safely dispose of loggers in the MSI installer #37043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Safely dispose of loggers in the MSI installer #37029
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #37034
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2319769 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • csc.exe exits with code -2146232797 when attempting to concatenate strings that are part of an inline array #70910
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797, crash in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer #70909
  • Inconsistency between handling of `params` and default parameters during overload resolution #70908
  • F# missing syntactic classification highlighting #70905
  • Explicitly implemented members should not perform binding when computing their names #70901
  • CSharpUsePrimaryConstructorCodeFixProvider threw an exception #70898

Closed

  • Prefix unmerged changes from linked projects with "TODO" #290
    Backlog
  • Stack overflow with large nested collection expression #70381
    17.9
  • Unable to invoke quick fix for some suggestions #69636
    18.0
  • Visual Studio suggests new C# language features despite pinning the SDK to .NET 6.0 in `global.json` file #70902
  • IDE0028 analyzer and code fixer produce not compilable code #70904
  • `IDE0301` gets reported for `Array.Empty<T>()` inside Ternary Expression (and possibly other expressions?) #70903
  • Use Primary Constructor makes variables visible to the class that weren't before. #70899

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add SourceText.GetContentHash #70838
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix captured variables analysis #70810
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change inline rename control's color when format map change #70853
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary hardcoded value in Generate-Type dialog #70906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Fix spelling mistakes #70907
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cut off deeply nested collection expressions #70882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify acceptability check helpers in OverloadResolution #70890
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pool intermediary collections when performing classification tagging/aggregation. #70884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Downgrade editor packages to fix build break #70872
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ship Devkit dependencies as a nuget package to support directly including in the C# extension #70875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Wasm.Performance Dockerfiles #52229
  • Provide updated Blazor Server template for .NET 8 #52227
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52225
  • Debugging Blazor application freezes Chrome (and Edge) #52223
  • NET 8 Blazor Cookie Authentication and Authorization Policy not the same as in NET 7 #52222
  • DeniedValuesAttribute validation not working as expected when property is of type "short", in Blazor #52221
  • NotifyPropertyChanged + Blazor Server UI Thread #52217
  • Support for multiple clients per server project #52216
    Planning: WebUI
  • OnInitialized and OnInitializedAsync are called twice with @rendermode InteractiveServer #52208
  • Blazor web app (dotnet 8): data-enhance-nav="false" is not working when tag <a/> is wrapping some <svg/> #52205
  • Allow defining Blazor component parameters at runtime #52204
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #52201
  • Scaffolding Identity in Blazor .NET 8 app creates cshtml rather than Razor pages #52200

Closed

  • [.NET 8] ASP.NET Core Web API Server is Not Accessible in Docker #52059
  • Identity: TwoFactorRememberMe scheme should be signed out if authorization for this scheme failed due to the failure of validation of the security stamp (leads to login/logout loop if the next login does not sign in two factor remember this machine). #37963
    7.0-preview1
  • [ARM][.NET 7] - System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException on ThreadPool ctor #51550
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting still maintained or deprecated? #52228
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, updates #52188
  • JavaScript events are not working while `blazor.web.js` is included #52212
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52202
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52147
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52146
  • Content Management Feature #52214
  • EPIC: Support publishing ASP.NET Core API apps with Native AOT (WIP) #45910
    8.0.0
  • Angular/React .NET 6.0.404 project template.json ids match those in .NET 7 #45462
    Backlog
  • Blazor style guide for using of leading @ when specifying a component render mode #51480
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Identity Pages - Inifnite Redirect Loop when adding second external provider #51950
    8.0.0
  • Consider using signed HTTP exchanges as a way to download ICU data on browsers that support it #32110
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Form API should expose a caller id on Submit #32202
    Backlog
  • Wrongly assigned number in for statement with Blazor #52184
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52173
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52174
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52182
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52183
  • Create Blazor component and associated style sheet. #38526
    Planning: WebUI
  • Register Blazor's ComponentHub in the IServiceCollection #29194
    Planning: WebUI
  • Allow render fragments for Blazor components in MVC views #21603
    Planning: WebUI
  • Binding UI Controls to Dynamic Object #15244
    Planning: WebUI
  • Make CreateStaticFilesOptions API public #26544
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add more detailed description to Blazor @on events #29227
    Planning: WebUI
  • Support two-way biding for 'value' property for custom elements #24628
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Include a checkbox for WebAssemblyPrerendered in the New Project Wizard #36915
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix the `::after` root component element selector #52233
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52232
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK (9.0.100-alpha.1.23568.4) #52224
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formaction attribute" #52220
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix radio button reset after submitting enhanced form #52219
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Use HTTPS URLs for json.schemastore.org #52203
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet dump analyze's `gcroot <address>` crashes on arm64 #4388
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Provide better error messages for IPC connect failures #4406

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Slider is buggy depending on order of properties #18910
  • Problem with binding native IOS Library #18909
  • Unable to publish wpf blazor self contained with code behind razor files #18908
  • Implict styling of NavigationPage IconColor does not work #18907
  • GitHub Actions no longer builds MAUI (Android): Java SDK 11.0 or above is required when using .NET 6 or higher #18906
  • resource mipmap/appicon_round (aka com.companyname.mauiapp:mipmap/appicon_round) not found #18904
  • PopoverBackgroundViewType not working in Mac #18903
  • Navigation Toolbar broken in .NET8 #18902
    Backlog
  • [Android] "MaterialButton manages its own background" log message when setting BackgroundColor to Button #18898
  • [Android] "Failed to inflate ColorStateList" error is logged when setting Color to CheckBox #18897
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test C3 #18896
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Image disappears after navigating back to page #18895
    Backlog
  • Bitmap accumulates until OutOfMemory exception #18894
  • Clipping issues for Border control (all platforms, but different on each platform) #18893
    Backlog

Closed

  • Style Trigger Binding Not Recognizing Default Setter #17597
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/8.0.0] Button background does not override implicit visualstate style #18103
    .NET 8 GA
  • InputTransparent with Opacity/IsVisible behaves differently with iOS/Mac vs Windows/Android #18470
  • 8.0.3 Android FlyoutPage Doesnt work on .NET 7 no problem #18846
  • Cannot change Japanese input method after open basic authentication dialog #18619
  • Image blinks when imagesource connected to mpeg stream #18642
  • [iOS][.NET8] Task not found for Xamarin.MacDev.Tasks.GetFullPaths #18900
  • JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault breaks hot reload #18829
    Backlog
  • Maui Rc1 and .net 7 app crashes if you have entitlements #17714
  • SVG Image does not work on Button's ImageSource on Android #18537

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Modal OnNavigatedTo #18912
  • Fix "Test attachment file path could not be found" #18911
  • [tests] Ignore flaky android tests #18905
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C3 #18899
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 SR1
  • [C] implicit style VSM do not override Manual value #18680
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `WebView` #18810
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Revert "[Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11" #18888

Updated

  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18553
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ExecuteUpdate` doesn't work on JSON columns? #32367
  • Hashset contains becomes a traditional IN statement instead of the new OpenJSON parameter #32365
  • dotnet ef dbcontext optimize failing with HasTrigger modifer on ToTable #32364
  • EF Core Cosmos 7.0.13 => 7.0.14 Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'derivedType') #32363
  • ToJson() not working for entity with a Property named Id #32360
  • Missed opportunity for IN instead of EXISTS in ExecuteDelete #32359
  • DbContext Scaffold : The specified deps.json does not exist #32358
  • EF Core Inheritance: Profile Field Null on Retrieval Despite of Configured Relationships #32352
  • Better support for team development of database migrations #32351
  • HasKey(p => new { p.Id, p.ComplexType.Property }) does not seem to work #32350

Closed

  • EfCore 8: Primitive collections in JSON documents error with init #32310
    8.0.1
  • Adding a new (non-nullable) JSON column populates it with an empty string (invalid JSON) #32353
  • Can EF Core 7 translate Concat (UNION ALL) with a value? #32337
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32369
  • [release/8.0] Don't throw when attempting to load from a newly Added entity with unknown FK values #32368
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.3 to 1.10.4 #32361
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Do extra processing for init-only fields (#32342) #32355
    Servicing-approved
  • Make default value '{}' for non-nullable JSON columns #32354
  • Don't throw when attempting to load from a newly Added entity with unknown FK values #32343
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.13 to 8.0.0 #32362
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Make ILazyLoader not IDisposable #32345
  • Do extra processing for init-only fields #32342
  • Rename solution to EFCore.sln #32344

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support BigInteger, Int128 & UInt128 #31778
    needs-design
  • Attempt to fix 32154 #32157
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.59.0 #32287
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Move compiled model tests to EFCore.Specification.Tests #32341
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync (#31449) #32334
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.16

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 9 SDK installed, Some files are not identical in .exe installer and in .zip package. #17838
  • [NETE2ESDK]VS version on .NET 9 SDK installation wizard needs to be updated to the latest stable release version. #17836

Closed

  • dotnet-host-7.0 : Conflicts: dotnet-host #17811

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to Fedora 39 #17840
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #17837

Merged

  • These changes should allow complete cross-builds just via OverrideTargetRid #17832
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17829

Updated

  • Download and compare linux-musl-x64 MSFT sdk #17823
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17817
  • License scan updates #17833
  • Update Aspire baseline manifest version #17809
